content: भेदन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [भिद्-णिच् ल्यु ल्युट् वा] {@--1@} Breaking, dividing &c. {@--2@} Loosening (as the feces), purgative. --नं {@--1@} Splitting, breaking, rending. {@--2@} Dividing, separating. {@--3@} Distinguishing. {@--4@} Sowing dissensions, creating discord. {@--5@} Dissolving, loosening. {@--6@} Disclosing, betraying. {@--7@} Disunion, discord. {@--8@} Asa Fœtida. {@--9@} (In <ab>astr.</ab>) Passing through a constellation. --नः A hog.
